HeaderSection.title: Internxt vs Filen overview

internxtFeatures: Drive, VPN, Antivirus, Cleaner, Meet, Mail

PrivacyViolationsSection.title: Why you should consider an alternative to Filen
PrivacyViolationsSection.description: Choose Internxt for full security for your files and personal data. Zero-knowledge and audited security, with a full product suite.

descriptions: The absence of a recent independent security audit for Filen limits confidence. Users face uncertainty about key management and architecture reliability, which is concerning for sensitive files.
Filen offers only basic cloud storage. Internxtâ€™s full suite includes Antivirus, VPN, Cleaner, and private Meet, all designed to secure your entire digital presence from Big Tech.
Filen's policy of deleting accounts for inactivity puts users at risk of losing data forever if they don't log in regularly. Internxt offers more robust long-term access for casual users.
Without proper business or family plans, Filen fails to support collaborative needs. Teams cannot share storage efficiently or manage users, making it unsuitable for professional organizations.

WhyNeedAlternativeSection.title: Go beyond cloud storage and get full privacy
WhyNeedAlternativeSection.description: For full privacy, get total security combined with zero-knowledge and post-quantum encryption from Internxt.

descriptions: Internxt is the first cloud to implement post-quantum encryption (Kyber-512), future-proofing your data against quantum computer attacks that will break standard AES-256.
Internxt goes beyond storage, offering a full ecosystem (VPN, Antivirus, Meet) to protect your device and online identity in one single secure subscription.
Unlike Filen, which has retired most Pro Lifetime plans, Internxt continues to offer affordable lifetime access for up to 5TB with a 30-day money-back guarantee.

VersusSection.title: Internxt vs Filen
VersusSection.description: Internxt offers unrivaled privacy thanks to post-quantum encryption, giving you the best protection from future cyberattacks.

inxtTable.title: Internxt: Total privacy, transparency, and trust

features.title: Audited Open Source
features.description: Internxt's code is public and independently audited by Securitum, ensuring no hidden backdoors or vulnerabilities.

features.title: Zero-knowledge & PQE
features.description: Your data is encrypted on your device with post-quantum algorithms, ensuring security against current and future threats.

features.title: Flexible Lifetime Plans
features.description: One-time payment for lifetime access up to 5TB. Stackable plans to expand storage as needed for {{percentage}}% off.

features.title: Open source, no audit
features.description: Filen is open source, but lacks recent independent third-party audits to verify its security claims.

features.title: Standard encryption
features.description: Uses industry-standard AES-256, which may become vulnerable as quantum computing technology evolves.

features.title: German Compliance
features.description: Based in Germany and compliant with GDPR, but lacks the broader compliance certifications of Internxt.

features.title: Subscription focus
features.description: Moving away from lifetime models; Pro Lifetime plans are increasingly restricted or retired.

WhyBestAlternativeSection.title: Why Internxt is the best alternative to Filen
WhyBestAlternativeSection.description: Internxt Drive offers a comprehensive suite of products designed to give you back control of your online privacy.

descriptions: Built-in protection against malware, ransomware, and spyware directly within your secure drive app.
Encrypt your internet connection, block trackers, and browse privately from anywhere in the world.
Identify and eliminate duplicate or junk files to keep your storage efficient and your device running smoothly.
Private video calls with post-quantum encryption, free from the tracking and data collection of Big Tech.
Take control with WebDAV, Rclone, and NAS support. Available on Windows, Mac, Linux, and mobile.

freePlanCard.description: Get 1GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Is Internxt a more secure and private alternative to Filen?
answer: Yes, Internxt is the first to offer post-quantum encryption alongside zero-knowledge policies, and it is independently audited by security firms.
While Filen is secure, Internxt offers a broader privacy suite including VPN, Antivirus, and private Meet calls.

faq.question: What is post-quantum encryption, and is it more secure?
answer: Unlike standard AES-256 used by Filen, post-quantum encryption (PQE) resists attacks from quantum computers, future-proofing your data for the next decade.

faq.question: Where is Internxt based?
answer: Internxt is based in Valencia, Spain, complying with strict GDPR and EU data protection laws.

faq.question: Is Filen more expensive than Internxt?
answer: With our exclusive {{percentage}}% discount, Internxt lifetime and annual plans are highly competitive and offer more features than Filen's storage-only model.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can reach us at hello@internxt.com. Our Customer Success Team offers live support, unlike many smaller providers.

faq.question: Can I add more storage to my lifetime plan?
answer: Yes, storage is stackable. You can upgrade or add new plans at any time from your account settings.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt accepts debit/credit cards, PayPal, iDEAL, Sofort, Cryptocurrency, and Klarna for maximum flexibility.
